name: Animals under attack: Free games for iPhone
name_original: Animals under attack: Free games for iPhone
description:
Shoot the various animals in the limited time. Level by level your garden will be changed and new animals will come to the scene.

FEATURES:

- Accelerometer-based aiming
- Stunning arcade with addictive non-stop action
- Funny animation and sounds
- A lot of levels and animals
- Bonuses
- Game Center support
